body.name: Titan Hero Series 12-Inch New Iron Spiderman Action Figure Toy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 8 mins
features: 12-Inch tall Spiderman figure - Spiderman Titan Hero Series 12-Inch New Red and Black Suit Action Figure Toy, Movie Inspired, for Kids Ages 4 and Up. Imagine Peter suiting up as the friendly, neighborhood Spiderman with this 12-inch-tall Spiderman figure, inspired by the classic character design from the titan hero series Comics.

This Titan Hero Series figure features design inspired by the spiderman movie, part of the Cinematic Universe.Fans can imagine the web-slinging and wall-crawling Spidey adventures with this Spiderman figure, inspired by the character from the titan hero series comic books.
Each Titan Hero figure features articulated arms that allow kids to pose them for action-packed play.
Imagine joining iconic hero spiderman as he swoops through the city to do battle against villains threatening peace.

Look for other Spidey Super hero toys - be on the lookout for other Spiderman figures and gear to imagine the web-slinger swinging into action! Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.
body.description: Spiderman gears up in his New Black and Red Suit to fight evil and defeat villains everywhere! Swing into excitement with spiderman! With this spiderman movie-inspired line of toys, kids can imagine the web-slinging, wall-crawling action as spiderman faces new challenges and new villains. Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability. Kids can imagine their own epic adventures with this Titan Hero Series figure. Wearing the mask that has made him a legend, he battles evil wherever a hero is needed as the one-and-only Spiderman! Super-size your super hero adventures with this incredible Titan Hero Series Spiderman figure! This 12-inch web-slinging dynamo is ready to open up a large-sized attack on the foes of justice everywhere. With him at your side, there’s no telling where your adventures will take you! Gear up for big and tall action with this 12-inch Spiderman figure! This mighty Spiderman figure stands 12 inches tall and he's got the web-slinging power to defeat any enemy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Brittle, plastic breaks easy
reviews.reviewText: Looked great out the box, son broke the finger off in about 5 minutes. He has other toys and none of then broke this quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing has no cellophane face on box. And the box is crushed. A day before birthday party ---

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost the box was completely destroyed as if it was repackaged.. additionally the Spider-Man has to be wiped off due to some residue being on the figure ..
